price: Saa Da no, wͻn mu nipa biara ani bεbere wͻ asεm a εfa ͻno ara ne ho a, obi deε mmfa ne ho.
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel
